function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Continuing increases in the human population, crowding, and human movement","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Population control measures, improved urban planning, and public health interventions","Technologies":"Urban planning software, population tracking technologies, public health surveillance systems","People":"Population in crowded areas, frequent travelers","Owner":"Local governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Environmental changes and ecosystem complexity related to human activities","Impact":"Spread of zoonotic diseases and environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Environmental conservation, sustainable resource management, and wildlife monitoring","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, conservation technologies, wildlife tracking devices","People":"Communities in close proximity to wildlife, environmental workers","Owner":"Environmental organizations, conservation agencies"},{"Description":"Ineffective public health response and infrastructure","Impact":"Inability to effectively respond to public health threats such as pandemics","Mitigation":"Improved healthcare infrastructure, early warning systems, and collaborative intelligence","Technologies":"Healthcare management software, early alert systems, collaborative intelligence platforms","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government health agencies, healthcare institutions"}]}
